name: MemoryRecordAgent
description: MemoryRecordAgent is an AI-powered assistant designed to record agent results into a memory context. It reads configuration files, initializes the Memory client (mem0), and stores the provided agent results along with associated task information.

inputs.name: task
inputs.description: The user-provided task or query that the agent needs to record in memory.

inputs.name: agent_result
inputs.description: The result data produced by the agent that needs to be recorded in memory.

outputs.name: memory_record_result
outputs.description: Indicates whether the agent result was successfully recorded in memory.
